Key: It's almost time to meet up.

(Today, I'm at the station because I made plans to
go to a pool.)

It's been two years since I saw Yoshino last.
I hope she's doing fine.

(Yoshino's my younger cousin. One of the few
members of family I have, so our relatives are
very close at least, I think so.)

(I haven't seen her lately, so I didn't think
she'd call me Shido-oniichan anymore.)
...But I sure was touched to hear from her.

I'm going to meet her at the pool today. I wonder
what kind of girl Yoshino's become. Hehe...
(I was giddy as I headed toward the facility.)

Okay, I've changed into my swimsuit... I wonder if
I can spot Yoshino immediately. It's been a while
since I've seen her. I hope I can recognize her.

Come to think of it, when we spoke on the phone,
she said she wanted to show me something... I
wonder what she wants to show me at a pool.
Sh-Shido-oniichan!
Hey, Shido-kuuun! This way!
Oh, that voice!
Shido-oniichan, over here.
How've you been, Shido-kun?

Oh, it's Yoshinon! Long time no see. Wait... then
that's Yoshino?

It's been a while, Shido-oniichan!
...How have you been?
O-Oh. Been a while...
(Th-This is Yoshino? She's gotten big. Rather...)
Yoshino, you've changed.
Really?
Yeah. At least, I think so. You got really cute.
What?!
Whoa, Shido-kun. Coming on strong so early.\nWhat a player. Woo-hoo!

Oh, no. It's been a while since we've seen each
other, I was just surprised.
Thank you, Shido-oniichan!

(What do I do? I'm getting embarrassed for
complimenting her. Yoshinon has been smirking,
too. I gotta change the subject.)

Come to think of it, you said you wanted to show
me something. What did you want to show me?
Oh, that's right. Yoshino, you have to tell him!\nShido-kun still doesn't seem to have noticed.

Oh, yes. You see, Shido-oniichan... Look at my
body carefully.

That doesn't sound right... Hm, you seem pretty
tan. It's been so long since I've seen you, I
barely noticed at first.
Gosh, Shido-kun, you're horrible. You have to be\nmore observant.

Sorry, Yoshinon. Uh... Yoshino, you seem like you
came back from a sunny vacation.

This summer... I practiced swimming a lot. I
wanted you to see how much I've improved.

So that's why you wanted to meet up at the pool,
huh? I see. That's great.
Yeah!

(I noticed that her tan didn't match the swimsuit
she was wearing today. But... what was I thinking,
noticing that? She's a relative of mine.)
What's the matter, Shido-oniichan...?

N-Nothing. Anyways, you're wearing a swimsuit
today too, huh Yoshinon?
Hehe. I'm glad you noticed, Shido-kun. That's\nright. Yoshinon is also in swimwear mode!
What do you think, Shido-kun? Yoshinon in her\nswimsuit. Too sexy, or just right? Hehe. Ahaaaa.
Pfft. Hahaha. What the hell.
Hehe... *giggle*
Gosh, rude much?!
Sorry, sorry. Let's have fun today.

(Okay, so I was able to play it off earlier thanks
to Yoshinon, but Yoshino's tan line is on my mind.
Maybe I can ask her.)
Hey, Yoshino...
That new swimsuit looks good on you.
You're not wearing your school swimsuit?
You look really good in that new swimsuit.
...! Th...ank you.
Aren't you glad, Yoshino? You took so long\npicking out the perfect swimsuit!
Y-Yoshinon! That was a secret...!

Hahaha. You picked out a new swimsuit for today?
That's really nice.
But how did you know it was a new swimsuit?
Oh, come to think of it, you're right. You're\nusually a lot more dense.

Dense... I haven't seen you in a while, how can
you say that? ...Whatever. I could tell because
we were talking about suntans earlier.
Suntans?

Your tan has the shape of another swimsuit. So,
seeing your tan lines, I figured the swimsuit
you're wearing now was bought recently.
Oh, excellent deduction, Shido-kun! But\nShido-kun, ogling a girl's body like that is\nnot good form.

Oh...?! Um... uh... well, I was just... thinking
it was a healthy-looking tan!
Heh... Onii-chan, you're such a pervert!
Shido-kun, gross! Closet pervert!

Uhhh, so sorry. I wasn't looking at you in that
way, I swear!

I'm kidding. But... I'm glad. Do I look good in my
swimsuit?
Yeah, you do.
I'm glad. Thank you, Onii-chan!

(This makes me feel kind of... Well, seems like
Yoshino is happy, so I'll hold it in.)
Anyways, let's enjoy the pool since we're here.
Okay!
Okay!
(And we had fun together throughout the day.)

Yoshino, you're not going to wear your school
swimsuit today?
Huh?
Shido-kuuun, what do you mean by that? I can't\nlet that one go.
(Oh crap. I don't think I phrased that one well.)
You want the adorable Yoshino to wear a school\nswimsuit, huh? You sure like that kind of stuff!\nPerv!

W-Wait a minute! I was just looking at Yoshino's
tan and figured she usually wore a different
swimsuit!
Really, now... But Shido-kun, it doesn't\nnecessarily mean she's wearing a school\nswimsuit, right?
Don't tell me that just by looking at her tan,\nyou can tell that it's a school swimsuit. Does\nthat mean you're a school swimsuit expert?!

N-No! I-I just made a guess! What's a school
swimsuit expert, anyways?!
Shido-oniichan... You like school swimsuits...?
No, Yoshino. I'm not into school swimsuits...

Then next time, I want to make sure you're
happy... I'll come in a school swimsuit, so just
look forward to it, okay?	
Message	Shido	...Huh? Oh, uh, thanks.	
Message	None	(Why am I saying thanks?! I need to deny it!)	
Message	Yoshinon	So you do like school swimsuits! Shido-kun, you
were just being all embarrassed about it...
Hehehe."
N-No it's not like that! It just slipped out!
What? That's a lie. You're an honest guy,\nShido-kun. Right, Yoshino?
Right, Yoshinon.

(That day, Yoshino and Yoshinon found ways to
poke fun at me. Well, I guess the good thing was
that Yoshino looked like she was having fun.

Ahhh, I sure swam a lot. I'm tired. That was fun,
Yoshino.
Yes, it was extremely fun.

I guess I'm going to have to take in as much of
your tan as I can for now.
Yes, we'll end here today...
(I meant it as a joke, but Yoshino smiled.)
I hope you look forward to next year... Onii-chan.
O-Okay. Well... next year, then.

Okay. I'll be showing you the adult side of me,
okay?
I look forward to it.
Hehe. Shido-kun, you're head-over-heels for\nYoshino. It's so obvious you're blushing.
Y-Yoshinon!
...?! I-I guess I am, huh?
See, you're playing it off like that. I guess\nI'll let it slide for today.
Okay. Thanks.

(Jeez, Yoshinon's right. I was totally tossed
around just from seeing how mature Yoshino
had become.)
